title: JSON schema of Apify Actor key-value store schema

actorKeyValueStoreSchemaVersion.description: The version of the key-value store schema. It's a required integer and must be exactly 1.
actorKeyValueStoreSchemaVersion.x-intellij-html-description: The version of the key-value store schema. It's a required integer and must be exactly 1.
actorKeyValueStoreSchemaVersion.markdownDescription: The version of the key-value store schema. It's a required integer and must be exactly 1.

title.description: The title of the key-value store schema. It's a required string.
title.x-intellij-html-description: The title of the key-value store schema. It's a required string.
title.markdownDescription: The title of the key-value store schema. It's a required string.

description.description: A description of the key-value store schema. It's an optional string.
description.x-intellij-html-description: A description of the key-value store schema. It's an optional string.
description.markdownDescription: A description of the key-value store schema. It's an optional string.

type.description: A constant value that must be "object", indicating the schema describes a JSON object.
type.x-intellij-html-description: A constant value that must be "object", indicating the schema describes a JSON object.
type.markdownDescription: A constant value that must be "object", indicating the schema describes a JSON object.

title.description: The title of the collection. It's an optional string.
title.x-intellij-html-description: The title of the collection. It's an optional string.
title.markdownDescription: The title of the collection. It's an optional string.

description.description: A description of the collection. It's an optional string.
description.x-intellij-html-description: A description of the collection. It's an optional string.
description.markdownDescription: A description of the collection. It's an optional string.

contentTypes.description: An array of allowed content types for the files in the collection (e.g., "application/json", "image/jpeg"). The array must contain at least one unique item. This attribute is required if jsonSchema is present.
contentTypes.x-intellij-html-description: An array of allowed content types for the files in the collection (e.g., "application/json", "image/jpeg"). The array must contain at least one unique item. This attribute is required if jsonSchema is present.
contentTypes.markdownDescription:
An array of allowed content types for the files in the collection (e.g., "application/json", "image/jpeg"). The
array must contain at least one unique item. This attribute is required if `jsonSchema` is present.

keyPrefix.description: Prefix for all keys in this collection. It's used when a collection contains multiple files. This attribute is mutually exclusive with key.
keyPrefix.x-intellij-html-description: Prefix for all keys in this collection. It's used when a collection contains multiple files. This attribute is mutually exclusive with key.
keyPrefix.markdownDescription:
Prefix for all keys in this collection. It's used when a collection contains multiple files. This attribute is
mutually exclusive with `key`.

key.description: Exact key for a single file in the collection. This is used when a collection contains only one specific file. This attribute is mutually exclusive with keyPrefix.
key.x-intellij-html-description: Exact key for a single file in the collection. This is used when a collection contains only one specific file. This attribute is mutually exclusive with keyPrefix.
key.markdownDescription:
Exact key for a single file in the collection. This is used when a collection contains only one specific file.
This attribute is mutually exclusive with `keyPrefix`.

jsonSchema.description: A JSON schema object that defines the structure of the JSON content for files in the collection. This is only applicable when contentTypes includes "application/json".
jsonSchema.x-intellij-html-description: A JSON schema object that defines the structure of the JSON content for files in the collection. This is only applicable when contentTypes includes "application/json".
jsonSchema.markdownDescription:
A JSON schema object that defines the structure of the JSON content for files in the collection. This is only
applicable when `contentTypes` includes "application/json".

^.description: A property within the collections object that defines the schema for a specific collection. The property name can be any string.
^.x-intellij-html-description: A property within the collections object that defines the schema for a specific collection. The property name can be any string.
^.markdownDescription:
A property within the `collections` object that defines the schema for a specific collection. The property name
can be any string.

collections.description: A required object where each property represents a collection of files in the key-value store. Each property name is an arbitrary string that identifies the collection.
collections.x-intellij-html-description: A required object where each property represents a collection of files in the key-value store. Each property name is an arbitrary string that identifies the collection.
collections.markdownDescription:
A required object where each property represents a collection of files in the key-value store. Each property
name is an arbitrary string that identifies the collection.
